short_description.en: Up to $840 off a qualifying Energy Star certified heat pump clothes dryer for income-qualified residents.
Up to $840 off a qualifying Energy Star certified electric or induction cooktop, stove, range, or oven, for income-qualified residents.
Up to $1,600 off qualifying insulation products for income-qualified residents.
Up to $175/ton rebate for qualified ducted or ductless air-source heat pumps.
$700/unit rebate for qualified ground source heat pumps.
$300/unit rebate on heat pump water heaters.
$50 rebate on an Energy Star smart thermostat for homes with refrigerated air conditioning.
$50 rebate on an induction cooktop.

Up to $0.239/CFM50 rebate on air sealing. Rebate amount dependent upon home heating and AC type
(gas, electric resistance, heat pump).
Up to $200/kW + $0.19/kWh rebate on duct sealing based on kW and kWh savings.
Up to $1.05/sqft rebate for ceiling insulation. Amount determined by R-Value and heat type.
Up to $0.30/sqft rebate for floor insulation. Amount determined by home type and heat type.
Up to a $500 rebate on the purchase of a qualified EV charger plus up to $1,500 in installation assistance.
Up to a $750 rebate on the purchase of a qualified EV charger plus up to $3,500 in installation assistance.
Free in-home energy check up or virtual video call appointment. Required for some equipment rebates.
$200 rebate on eligible advanced window evaporative coolers.
$500 rebate on a heat pump water heater.
Receive an $50 instant rebate on eligible Thermostat Rewards devices at the Xcel Energy Store.
Receive a one-time $75 enrollment bill credit for signing up for thermostat rewards.
Up to $3,000 refundable tax credit for new, leased or used electric vehicle.
Up to $400 refundable tax credit to install a level 1 or level 2 EV charger at home.
Up to $0.20/sqft rebate for cool roof products, dependent on home cooling type.
$1.00/Sqft rebate for solar screens on West and South facing single-pane windows. Must be rated to block minimum 80% of solar heat.
Up to $3.00/sqft rebate for ENERGY STAR windows, dependent on home cooling type.
$600 rebate for an eligible permanently installed evaporative cooling unit.
$1,000 tax credit for an Energy Star certified air source heat pump.
$2,000 refundable tax credit for an Energy Star certified air source heat pump, for income-qualified residents.
$2,000 refundable tax credit for an Energy Star rated ground source heat pump, for income-qualified residents.
$1,000 tax credit for an Energy Star rated ground source heat pump.
100% of cost up to $1,000 refundable tax credit for Energy Star rated windows and doors, per product installed. For income-qualified residents.
50% of cost up to $500 tax credit for Energy Star rated windows and doors, per product installed.
100% of cost up to $2,000 tax credit for insulation improvements, per product installed. For income-qualified residents.
50% of cost up to $1,000 tax credit for insulation improvements, per product installed.
$700 tax credit for an Energy Star rated heat pump water heater, for income-qualified residents.
$350 tax credit for an Energy Star rated heat pump water heater.
$1,000 tax credit for an electric vehicle charger product and installation costs, for income-qualified residents.
$500 tax credit for an electric vehicle charger product and installation costs.
10% of cost of installing home solar, up to $6,000 refundable tax credit.
$165 rebate for qualifying ENERGY STAR heat pump clothes dryers.
$110 rebate for qualifying ENERGY STAR electric clothes dryers.
$200 rebate for eligible ENERGY STAR induction cooktops and ranges.
$50 rebate on select ENERGY STAR smart thermostats.
$300 rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified heat pump water heater that is 50 gallons or larger.
$550 rebate for a qualifying mini-split air source heat pump. Home checkup required first.
$550 rebate for a qualifying ducted air source heat pump system. Home Checkup required first.
Up to 10% for attic/roof insulation improvements, up to $200, after a home energy checkup.
$2,500/ton rebate for qualified ground source heat pump systems.
$175/ton rebate for qualified air source heat pump systems.
Free home energy audit for residential customers.
$500/ton for new ground-source electric heat pump. $250/ton for replacement units.
$90 rebate for ENERGY STAR ventless hybrid heat pump clothes dryer. $30 rebate for ENERGY STAR electric dryer.
25% rebate off cost of new e-bike up to $150. 50% off the cost of extra battery up to $25 purchased with e-bike.
25% rebate of cost up to $150 for snowblower and walk-behind mowers, $50 for trimmer, leaf blower and power washer, and $100 for chainsaws.
25% rebate of cost up to $1000 for electric riding mower
$200 rebate for evaporative cooler. Minimum 2,500 CFM. Window and portable units are not eligible. Two rebates per account.
50% rebate up to $125 for labor and $125 for a Level 2 charger.  For managed charger, maximums are $500 for labor and $500 for charger.
Up to $16/kW for electric thermal storage and slab units controlled by timers or master control system.
50% up to $1,500 rebate for qualified air-source heat pumps larger than 1.5 tons.  Up to $500 for smaller systems. $500 extra for propane back-up.
50% up to $500/ton rebate for air-to-water heat pump radiant systems
$350 rebate for switching to induction cooktop/range from gas or propane or install in new construction.  Cooktop must be at least 30" wide.
$50 rebate per ENERGY STAR thermostat if enrolled in managed demand/response or time of use program.  $25/thermostat if not.
$350 rebate for qualified ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater (30-55 gallon capacity)
$100 rebate for new or replacement whole house fan.  Limit 2 per member account.
$500/ton off new ground source heat pump.  $250/ton for replacement unit. $100 rebate for desuperheater ground source heat pump powered hot water.
50% rebate up to $1,500 for qualified air source heat pump bigger than 1.5 tons. $500 for smaller systems.  $500 propane backup bonus for ducted.
$500/ton for air to water heat pump systems
$200 rebate for evaporator cooler with minimum flow rate of 2,500 CFM. Limit two per member account.
25% rebate up to $150 for e-bike plus 50% extra battery cost up to $25 with bike purchase. $300/account limit for outdoor rebates.
25% of cost rebate up to $150 for snowblower and walk-behind mowers, $50 for trimmer, leaf blower and power washer, and $100 for chainsaws.
25% rebate off the cost up of riding mower to $1000
$350 rebate for induction cooktop when replacing gas or propane. Cooktop minimum width of 30 inches.
$90 rebate for ENERGY STAR heat pump (ventless) clothes dryer. $100 rebate for electric clothes dryer.
$25 rebate/ENERGY STAR smart thermostat, $50/thermostat in managed program. Limit 2 for standard low-voltage. Limit 5 for  line-voltage applications.
$500/ton for air-to-water heat pump, not to exceed 50% of equipment cost.
$350 rebate for a new induction cooktop (minimum 30" width) when replacing gas or propane.
$500/ton rebate for ground source heat pump and $250/ton for replacement systems. Not to exceed 50% of equipment cost. $100 extra for desuperheater.
$200 rebate per evaporative cooler with at least 2,500 cubic feet/meter output. Limit 2. No window or portable units.
$25 rebate/ENERGY STAR smart thermostat, $50/thermostat in managed program.  Limit 2 for standard low-voltage. Limit 5 for line voltage thermostats.
50% equipment cost up to $1,500 for qualified air source heat pumps greater than 1.5 tons. Up to $500 for smaller systems.
$100 rebate for whole house fan. Limit 2 per member account. Attic ventilation systems do not qualify.
$75 rebate for ENERGY STAR electric clothes dryer. Extra $30 rebate may be available for qualified dryer. Total rebate limit per 12 month period.
25% of cost up to $100 for Learning thermostat.  Maximum limit for all rebates per year per member account.
$25 rebate/ENERGY STAR smart thermostat. $50 rebate/thermostat if in a managed program. Limit 2 for low-voltage, limit 5 for line voltage application.
$350 rebate for induction cooktop/range when replacing propane or gas. Cooktop must be at least 30" wide.
25% rebate of material costs for qualified ENERGY STAR windows and doors. Maximum yearly rebate limits.
30% rebate of material costs to upgrade or add insulation. Maximum yearly rebate limits.
50% rebate for caulking and weather-stripping materials. Maximum yearly rebate limits.
$2,000/unit rebate for closed loop geothermal heat pump. Additional rebates may be available. Maximum yearly rebate limits.
$500/ton for new ground source heat pump; $250/ton for replacement, up to 50% of equipment cost. AHRI certificate required. Max yearly rebate limit.
$1,000/unit for ducted air source heat pump; $500/indoor mini-split unit. At least 16 SEER. Max yearly rebate limit.
50% equipment cost up to $1,500 for air source heat pump greater than 1.5 tons. Up to $500 for smaller systems. 7.8 HSPF2 minimum.
25% of cost up to $150 for snowblower, walk-behind mower; $100 for chainsaws; $50 for trimmer, leaf blower, power washer.  50% extra battery to $25.
25% of cost rebate for electric riding mower up to $1,000. 50% of cost for extra battery up to $25. Maximum rebate limits.
$125 rebate for electric water heater (UEF 93% or higher). Maximum limit for all rebates over 12 months.
$350 rebate for ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater. There is a maximum limit for all rebates over 12 months.
$50 rebate for electric water heater if replacing propane/gas, $50/unit for managed/demand-response or $30/unit new construction. 30 gallon or larger.
$500 rebate for ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater (HP setting only). Maximum annual limit for all rebates.
Free basic home energy audit (not an extensive building professional audit)
Free level 2 electric vehicle charger.
50% of cost of Level 2 charger up to $125 labor and $125 product. Up to $500 labor and $500 product for a managed charger. Total rebate limit/year.
$90 rebate for ENERGY STAR heat pump (ventless) clothes dryer. $30 for ENERGY STAR electric resistance dryer.
$350 rebate for induction cooktop (minimum width 30") if switch from gas or propane or put in new construction.
$25 rebate for smart thermostat. $50 rebate if enrolled in managed program. Limit 2 for standard/low-voltage applications. Limit 5 for line-voltage.
$200 rebate for permanent evaporative cooling (minimum airflow of 2,500 CFM). Limit 2 per member account. Replacement or new.
$50 rebate for electric water heater if replacing propane/gas, $50/unit for managed/demand-response or $30/unit new construction. 30 gallon or larger.
$350 rebate for ENERGY STAR air source heat pump water heater (30 gal. minimum)
$16/kW for electric thermal storage units and $12/kW for thermal slabs controlled by timers or master control systems. Min. load for ETS is 1kW.
50% of Level 2 cost up to $125 for EV charger and $125 for labor. If managed system, the rebate is 50% of cost up to $500 for charger/$500 for labor.
$500/ton for air-to-water heat pump e.g., for radiant floors) up to 50% of equipment cost. AHRI certificate required.
$1,500 for qualified air source heat pumps greater than 1.5 tons. $500 for smaller systems. Max rebate: 50% equipment cost. $500 for propane back-up.
$500/ton for new ground source heat pumps. $250 for replacements. AHRI certificate required.
25% of cost rebate up to $150 for e-bike plus 50% of cost of extra battery up to $25 at time of bike purchase. $300 max outdoor equipment rebate/yr.
25% of cost up to $1000 for riding mower.  50% cost up to $25 for extra battery bought at time of mower purchase.
25% cost up to $150 for electric snowblower, walk-behind mower; $50 for trimmer, blower, power washer; $100 for chainsaw. 50% ($25 max) extra battery
$100 rebate for whole house fan. Limit 2 per member account. New or replacement.
$30 rebate for ENERGY STAR electric resistance clothes dryer.
$350 rebate to switch from gas/propane stove to induction cooktop/range at least 30" wide. $350 for induction in new construction.
$200 rebate per evaporative cooler with minimum airflow of 2,500 CFM. Limit 2 per member account. New or replacement.
$350 rebate per qualified ENERGY STAR air source heat pump water heater (30 gallon or larger)
Electric resistance water heater rebates: $50/unit to replace propane/gas, $50/unit for managed or $30/unit new construction. 30 gallon or larger.
$16/kW rebate for electric thermal storage and slab and $12/kW for thermal slabs. Must be controller by timers or control system. Min. load is 1 kW.
$500/ton for a new ground source heat pump system and $250/ton for replacement units.
$500/ton rebate for air-to-water radiant systems up to 50% of equipment cost.
$1,500 for qualified air source heat pumps greater than 1.5 tons, $500 for smaller systems. Up to 50% of equipment cost. Bonus for propane backup.
$100 rebate to switch from electric stove to induction cooktop/range that is at least 30" wide.
$100 rebate for induction cooktop/range (at least 30" wide) if you switch from an electric stove.
$100 rebate for switching to induction cooktop/range from electric. Cooktop must be at least 30" wide.
$100 rebate for induction cooktop when replacing electric stove. Cooktop must be at least 30" wide.
$100 rebate for a new induction cooktop (minimum 30" width) when replacing an electric stove.
$100 rebate for induction cooktop/range when replacing electric stove. Cooktop must be at least 30" wide.
$25 rebate per ENERGY STAR smart thermostat.
$1,500 for qualified air source heat pump minisplits greater than 1.5 tons, $500 for smaller systems up to 50% of equipment cost.
$50 rebate for electric water heater if replacing propane/gas, $50/unit for managed/demand-response or $30/unit new construction. 30 gallon or larger.
50% of Level 2 charger cost up to $125 labor and $125 charger. If charger is in managed program, charger rebate is 50% up to $500 labor/$500 charger.
25% of cost up to $1,000 for an electric riding mower.
25% of cost up to $150 for an e-bike. Up to $25 for extra battery at time of bike purchase. $300 outdoor equipment rebate limit per year.
25% cost up to $150 for electric snowblower, walk-behind mower; $50 for trimmer, blower, power washer; $100 for chainsaw. $25 max for extra battery.
Up to $250 rebate for professional home energy audit
$50/kW for ETS heater controlled by timers or master control system. Separate rebates for timers.
$75 rebate per ENERGY STAR smart thermostat controlling electric load.  $25 per programmable thermostat or time.
$350 rebate to switch to an induction cooktop/range (minimum 30" width) from gas or $100 rebate replacing electric. $350/unit new construction.
25% of cost of ebike up to $150.
25% rebate of cost up to $250 of electric two-stage snowblower and up to $150 for single stage snowblower.
25% rebate off cost of electric riding mower up to $1000.
25% rebate off cost of walk behind electric mower up to $150.
25% rebate off cost of electric chainsaw + battery up to $100.
$90 rebate per ENERGY STAR heat pump dryer.
$700 rebate for a ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater, minimum 30 gallons capacity.
$50 for electric-resistance water heater if switching from propane/gas or if managed through wi-fi enabled smart thermostat or timer on Time of Use.
$500/ton rebate for ducted/ductless air source heat pump (minimum HSPF2 8.5). $250 extra for weatherization. $500 propane bonus.
$500/ton rebate for air-to-water heat pump (minimum HSPF2 8.5). $250 extra for weatherization.
$500/ton rebate for new ground source heat pump (minimum 3/4 ton). $250/ton for replacement.  Extra $250 for weatherization.
Up to $1,000 to install electric vehicle charger. Rebate is 100% of charger cost up to $500 and 50% of plug installation cost up to $500.
$90 rebate for ENERGY STAR heat pump (ventless) clothes dryer.
$350/unit for induction cooktop replacing propane/natural gas or new construction.
$100/unit for induction cooktop replacing electric. 30" width minimum.
25% of cost up to $150 for walk-behind mower, $100 for chainsaw, $50 for trimmer, pruner, leaf blowers, power washer.  Up to $25 for extra battery.
25% of cost up to $1,000 for electric riding mower.
25% of cost up to $250 for 2-stage snow blower and $150 for 1-stage snow blower. 50% of cost up to $25 for extra battery at time of blower purchase.
25% of cost up to $150 for ebike. 50% of cost of extra battery up to $25 at time of bike purchase.
$16/kW for controlled off-peak heating electric thermal storage; $12/kW controlled off-peak thermal slab unit. Minimum load 1 kW.
$1,500 for qualified systems greater than 1.5 tons and $500 for smaller systems.
$500/ton for air-to-water radiant systems.
$1,500 for qualified systems greater than 1.5 tons and $500 for smaller systems. $500 bonus for propane backup.
$250 account credit for qualified Level 2 EV charger.
Up to $1,500 in matching funds for energy-efficient upgrades including heat pumps (16 SEER+), smart water heaters, insulation, thermostats and more.
$500 rebate for wiring a 240 volt circuit for a Level 2 electric vehicle charger. Income-qualified customers are eligible for up to $2,300.
$50 annual bill credit for signing up for off-peak electric vehicle charging schedule.
Up to $400 rebate on eligible large advanced evaporative coolers.
$80 rebate per ENERGY STAR certified windows.
$300 for qualified ENERGY STAR variable speed pool pump.
Wholesale-level pricing for refrigerated air, heat pumps, heat pump water heaters and smart thermostats.
$1,000 refundable tax credit for an electric vehicle charger product and installation costs for low-income households.
